statements: SELECT * FROM passwords;
SELECT id, username, created_at FROM passwords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM passwords WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, username FROM passwords ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username, encrypted_password, created_at FROM passwords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM passwords ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) as total_passwords FROM passwords GROUP BY id;
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users JOIN Passwords ON Users.user_id = Passwords.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM Passwords JOIN Users ON Passwords.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE Users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM passwords ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM passwords WHERE id=1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action='LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM passwords WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT * FROM password_policies WHERE min_length > 8;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM password_history ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, salt FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM password_policies WHERE min_length > 8;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM password_history ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_policy_name, password_length FROM password_policies WHERE password_length >= 8;
SELECT * FROM passwords WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, reset_token FROM password_reset_tokens ORDER BY reset_token_expiration ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.password_description, pp.password_policy_name FROM users u JOIN passwords p ON u.id = p.user_id JOIN password_policies pp ON u.id = pp.user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(ph.id) AS password_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN password_history ph ON u.id = ph.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, prt.reset_token, prt.reset_token_expiration FROM users u JOIN password_reset_tokens prt ON u.id = prt.user_id WHERE prt.reset_token_expiration > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
